dc:title: Review of In Solitary Witness
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Summary: Sees Franz Jagerstatter as a saint and martyr for conscientious objection and primacy of conscience. Capsules his life story. Keywords: saints, non-violence
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 827 1965-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
